      • captureStubApplicantPhoto

        public void captureStubApplicantPhoto(ApplicantDocumentDTO applicantDocumentDTO,
                                      boolean isExceptionPhoto)
                               throws RegBaseCheckedException
        Stubs the default photo if camera is not available
        Parameters:
        applicantDocumentDTO - the object where photo will be stored
        isExceptionPhoto - specifies if exception photo is required
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - throws exception if there is any error in reading stubbed images
